title: Neymar's poster of Brazil's Rio 2016 triumph has Gabigol's face covered up after he dates sister
text:
Neymar has sparked rumours of a feud with Gabigol after his Brazil team-mate began dating his sister, Rafella Santos.

The Paris Saint-Germain star posted an Instagram video from his home, which showed Gabigol's face had been covered up on a poster by a sheet of paper.

The original poster shows Neymar celebrating Brazil's 2016 Olympic triumph in Rio together alongside Gabigol and Gabriel Jesus.

Neymar posted an Instagram video which showed Gabigol's face covered up on a poster

The original image shows Neymar celebrating Brazil's2016 Olympic triumph with Gabigol

Shortly after, Gabigol posted his own Instagram video with Neymar's sister Rafella Santos

However, Gabigol's relationship with his sister, which is believed to have started several months ago, doesn't appear to have gone down well with the 27-year-old.

Shortly after eagle-eyed fans spotted the defaced poster, Gabigol posted his own video on Instagram of him smiling alongside Santos.

Gabigol: 2018/19 stats Age: 23 Club: Inter (on loan at Flamengo) Appearances: 32 Goals: 26 Brazil caps: 5 Goals: 2

A further video, published by Neymar's friend, Jo Amancio, again showed the poster, but on this occasion the piece of paper had been removed.

Gabigol moved to Inter Milan in 2016 but is currently on loan at Flamengo, after spending the past two seasons on loan at Santos and Benfica.

The striker has enjoyed success since returning to his homeland, having scored 26 goals in 32 games for the club.

The 23-year-old has won five caps for Brazil and made his first appearance for the national side in three years during the 1-1 draw against Nigeria this month.
description: Neymar has sparked rumours of a feud with  Gabigol after posting a video on his Instagram account which revealed his Brazil team-mate's face had been covered up on a poster by a sheet of paper.
